name: Crops Survivor
description:
Your crops are trying to murder you. Before you get overwhelmed, you have to harvest them all with your scythe and make sure you can survive!

How to play

- Crops will chase you and deal damage when they are close to you

- Auto-attack with your scythe just by staying close enough to the crops (a purple transparent bubble will show the area of effect of your scythe)

- Try to avoid the crops and harvest them.

- When a crop is harvested, it drops a seed.

- Seeds will earn you experience towards the next level.

- Each new level will grant you a choice between different upgrades

- Try to stay alive as long as possible and to harvest as many crops as you can

Controls

- Move with WASD
